name: Shot on the Run

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Dex 13, Dodge, Mobility, Point-Blank Shot, base attack bonus +4.

sections.text: As a full-round action, you can move up to your speed and make a single ranged attack at any point during your movement.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: You cannot move before and after an attack with a ranged weapon.
sections.name: Normal

description: You can move, fire a ranged weapon, and move again before your foes can react.
